Display indicator analysis

Source: R/f_display_indicator_analysis.R
f_display_indicator_analysis.Rd

Displays the analysis performed by [f_analyse_indicators()] in an interactive table using the DT package.

Usage

f_display_indicator_analysis(coin, filter_to_flagged = TRUE)

Arguments

coin

The coin.

filter_to_flagged

Logical: if `TRUE` filters to only show indicators with at least one flag.

Value

An interactive table (DT object).

Examples

MVI <- f_data_input(file_path = system.file("data_input/data_module-input.xlsx",
                                            package = "BuildIndex") )
#> Removed indicators with no data points: A.A.1, A.M.5, A.M.6, A.V.5, S.T.3, C.C.2, C.C.3, C.C.4, C.J.1, C.J.3, C.S.1, C.S.2, C.S.3
#> Removed categories containing no indicators: Acc_Hum
#> iData checked and OK.
#> iMeta checked and OK.
#> Written data set to .$Data$Raw

MVI <- f_analyse_indicators(MVI)

f_display_indicator_analysis(MVI)
